title: Downloading League Of Legends
body: I just want to know if anyone does have a link of League Of Legends Na full file download, coz i don't want update it on launcher thanks :)

replies.body: The official site will have the most recent available download.  You might have to update, but it won't be as much as doing an older install.  You can [download ](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)it here.  Hope that helps!
